Traits.Name: Architectural Alteration
Traits.Content: The Lurking Ward can manipulate its surroundings, altering architecture within a 30-foot radius to create walls and barriers temporarily. This ability does not require an action and can last for up to 1 hour.

Traits.Name: Invisible Enforcement
Traits.Content: The presence of a Lurking Ward creates an invisible field that prevents creatures from passing through certain areas without permission, effectively blocking paths unless a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check DC 15 is made.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Lurking Ward's innate ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells: At will: mage hand, minor illusion. 1/day each: hold person, unseen servant.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Lurking Ward makes three attacks: one with Tile Smash and two with Architectural Strike.

Actions.Name: Tile Smash
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Architectural Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) force damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

Actions.Name: Structural Collapse (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Lurking Ward creates an effect in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 (11d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save are also knocked back 10 feet.
